message: Hi Bob, for this first round I propose that I receive $60 and you receive $40. I believe this forward-thinking split takes into account our roles in making proposals and sets us up well if we reach further rounds. Let me know your thoughts!

Hi Alice, considering the inflation, I think a more balanced split is needed. I propose 55 for me and 45 for you. This way, we both get a decent amount, and it's more fair given the decreasing value of money.
